com.swopteam07.tablr.UI

Interface Scrollable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Panel, WindowPanel

    public interface Scrollable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disableHorizontalScrollbar()
      Remove the horizontal scrollbar from the drawn user interface.
      void disableVerticalScrollbar()
      Remove the vertical scrollbar from the drawn user interface.
      void enableHorizontalScrollbar()
      Add a horizontal scrollbar to the component.
      void enableVerticalScrollbar()
      Add a vertical scrollbar to the component.
      int getXOffset() 
      int getYOffset() 
      void setXOffset(int xOffset)
      Set the amount by which the x axis is shifted to the left when drawing.
      void setYOffset(int yOffset)
      Set the amount by which the y axis is shifted to the top when drawing.

    • Method Detail

      • enableHorizontalScrollbar

        void enableHorizontalScrollbar()
        Add a horizontal scrollbar to the component.

      • enableVerticalScrollbar

        void enableVerticalScrollbar()
        Add a vertical scrollbar to the component.

      • disableHorizontalScrollbar

        void disableHorizontalScrollbar()
        Remove the horizontal scrollbar from the drawn user interface.

      • disableVerticalScrollbar

        void disableVerticalScrollbar()
        Remove the vertical scrollbar from the drawn user interface.

      • getXOffset

        int getXOffset()
        Returns:
        The amount by which the x coordinate of scrollable elements needs to shifted to the left, based on the position of the scroll button in the horizontal scrollbar. If the horizontal scrollbar isn't enabled the result is always 0.

      • getYOffset

        int getYOffset()
        Returns:
        The amount by which the y coordinate of the scrollable elements needs to be shifted to the top, based on the position of the scroll button in the vertical scrollbar. If the vertical scrollbar isn't enabled the result is always 0.

      • setXOffset

        void setXOffset(int xOffset)
        Set the amount by which the x axis is shifted to the left when drawing.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - The new offset.

      • setYOffset

        void setYOffset(int yOffset)
        Set the amount by which the y axis is shifted to the top when drawing.
        Parameters:
        yOffset - The new offset.
